General.Name: ScanTech AI Systems Inc. Common stock
General.Description: ScanTech AI Systems Inc. develops systems, software, and artificial intelligence solutions for security checkpoints. The company offers SENTINEL CT, a checkpoint baggage inspection system; and ALL SECURE, a multi-energy cargo inspection system. It serves a range of critical infrastructure industries. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Buford, Georgia.
General.Address: 1735 Enterprise Drive, Buford, GA, United States, 30518-3319
